body_html: @klappradla Can you take one more look please? Apart from deleting the redundant authorize calls, I did two more commits. Because somewhere in the PR I introduced a DelegationError, that I didn't notice before 🙈 . It is solved with setting a default for from.
body_text: @klappradla Can you take one more look please? Apart from deleting the redundant authorize calls, I did two more commits. Because somewhere in the PR I introduced a DelegationError, that I didn't notice before 🙈 . It is solved with setting a default for from.
body: @klappradla Can you take one more look please? Apart from deleting the redundant `authorize` calls, I did two more commits. Because somewhere in the PR I introduced a `DelegationError`, that I didn't notice before 🙈 . It is solved with setting a default for `from`.
